name: part_006
file: tmp_【Mini 3D Live】hololive Indonesia Generasi 1 Bernyanyi Bersama #Area15Mini3DLive [oY0HSWOqV0s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'START:DASH!!' concludes with the three members dancing and striking a final pose.
Instrumental transition to the next song with on-screen text and stage visual effects.
Performance of the song 'Ikenai Borderline' begins, primarily featuring Risu and Moona.

subtitles.english: From the maze, finally out

subtitles.original: 抜け出したはずさ
subtitles.english: We must have escaped

subtitles.english: You and I will move forward

subtitles.original: いけないボーダーライン
subtitles.english: Forbidden Borderline

subtitles.original: Lyrics 西直紀 Composition コモリタミノル
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Naoki Nishi, Composition: Minoru Komorita

subtitles.original: 見つめ合って 恋をして
subtitles.english: Looking at each other, falling in love

subtitles.original: 無我夢中で 追いかけて
subtitles.english: Chasing frantically

subtitles.original: だけど もっと知りたくて メラメラしてる
subtitles.english: But I want to know more, I'm burning up

subtitles.original: 願うほどな 素顔で
subtitles.english: With a face as honest as my wishes

subtitles.original: 想うほど 熱になる
subtitles.english: The more I think, the hotter I get

subtitles.original: だから もっと飛び込むの 未知の世界
subtitles.english: So I'll dive further into the unknown world

subtitles.original: 恋とか
subtitles.english: Like love

subtitles.original: 夢とか
subtitles.english: Like dreams

subtitles.original: 誰でも 信じるけど
subtitles.english: Anyone would believe in them

subtitles.original: そこそこ 攻めなきゃつまらないよ
subtitles.english: But it's boring if you don't push the limits

subtitles.original: ギリギリ 愛 いけないボーダーライン
subtitles.english: On the edge, love, the forbidden borderline

subtitles.original: 難易度Gでも 全て壊してみせる
subtitles.english: Even at difficulty G, I'll show you I can break it all

subtitles.original: ギリギリ 舞 さらなるGへと
subtitles.english: On the edge, dance, towards an even higher G

subtitles.original: 意識が溶ける 体を制御不能な
subtitles.english: Consciousness melts, my body is out of control

subtitles.original: イッちゃうかもね
subtitles.english: I might go all the way

subtitles.original: 叫び合った 友達と
subtitles.english: With friends I've shouted with

subtitles.original: 求め合った あの人と
subtitles.english: With that person I've sought

subtitles.original: また会える 日のために ギラギラしてる
subtitles.english: I'm dazzling for the day we meet again

subtitles.original: 光るほど 影はでき
subtitles.english: The more it shines, the more shadows form

subtitles.original: 燃えるほど 灰になる
subtitles.english: The more it burns, the more it turns to ash

subtitles.original: 走るほど 見えてくる 危ないライフ
subtitles.english: The more I run, the more I see this dangerous life

subtitles.original: 自由も
subtitles.english: Like freedom

subtitles.original: 平和も
subtitles.english: Like peace

subtitles.original: 望めば 生まれるけど
subtitles.english: They're born if you wish for them

subtitles.original: もっと もっとしてたら腐っちゃうよ
subtitles.english: But if you have too much, they'll rot away

subtitles.original: ギリギリ 愛 危ないボーダーライン
subtitles.english: On the edge, love, the dangerous borderline

subtitles.original: 非常事態なら 限界越して魅せる
subtitles.english: In an emergency, I'll show you I can surpass limits

subtitles.original: ギリギリ 舞 限界突破なら
subtitles.english: On the edge, dance, if it's breaking through limits

subtitles.original: 塗り替えたい 破壊と再生 行こうわ
subtitles.english: I want to rewrite destruction and rebirth, let's go

subtitles.original: まだまだいける
subtitles.english: I can still go further

subtitles.original: ギリギリ 愛 いけないボーダーライン
subtitles.english: On the edge, love, the forbidden borderline

subtitles.original: 難易度Gでも 全て壊してみせる
subtitles.english: Even at difficulty G, I'll show you I can break it all

subtitles.original: ギリギリ 舞 さらなるGへと
subtitles.english: On the edge, dance, towards an even higher G

subtitles.original: 意識が溶ける 体を制御不能な
subtitles.english: Consciousness melts, my body is out of control

subtitles.original: イッちゃうかもね
subtitles.english: I might go all the way

subtitles.original: ギリギリ 愛 いけないボーダーライン
subtitles.english: On the edge, love, the forbidden borderline

subtitles.original: 燃え尽きながら まだ輝いてみせる
subtitles.english: While burning out, I'll show you I can still shine

subtitles.original: ギリギリ 舞 あなたのために
subtitles.english: On the edge, dance, for your sake

subtitles.original: 未来のために 何度だって咲いてしまう
subtitles.english: For the sake of the future, I'll bloom again and again
